attributes.action: make it a criminal offence to urinate, defecate, spit, vomit or drop chewing gum on the highway, or allow one's dog to defecate  thereon.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am ashamed to walk around and to see the disgusting mess on some of our pavements, we should not have to put up with it in a civilised society

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
